TopicTitle: Black screen if game opened in background

Articles.Content:

ksp version 1.7.0.2483 Game window set to 1600 x 1024

Nvidia gtx 970 w/ 4gb onboard. Bios 84.04.36.00.70,

Quad i7-2600 @ 3.4ghz

2 ViewSonic VX223 @ 1680 x 1050, 60hz.

24gb system ram 6tb total hard drive space.

Maybe a bug? I don't know. Easy to repro.
